titleStmt.title: John Dutton's, alias Prince Dutton's farewel to Temple-Bar. Licensed, June 19th, 1694
titleStmt.author: Dutton, John, fl. 1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, and are to be sold at the Golden Fleece in Fleetstreet, over against the Inner-Temple-Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Golden Fleece in Fleetstreet, over against the Inner-Temple-Gate
